message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its value, I believe a starting price of $14,000 feels fair. What do you think?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to share this product. Considering its value, I would like to propose a price of $10,000.
Thanks for your counter-offer, Bob. I understand your perspective on the value. However, I'm aiming for a price closer to $13,000.  Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
I appreciate your effort, Alice. Considering the value and our previous discussions, I would like to propose a price of $12,000.
